Plot: When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.
Title: World's Greatest Dad
Actors: Robin Williams, Daryl Sabara, Morgan Murphy, Naomi Glick
tomatoConsensus: World's Greatest Dad is a risky, deadpan, dark comedy that effectively explores the nature of posthumous cults of celebrity.
